Text: Final Report for Audit of Employee Expense Reports Cc Attached is the final report for our audit of employee expense reports No material control weaknesses were noted Selected minor issues noted include better documentation of entertainment expenses and the updating of policies and procedures for employee expenses Accounts Payable and NPNG management has agreed with the findings and are taking steps to implement the recommendations Doug

RE Final Report for Audit of Conflicts of InterestsBusiness Conduct Cc Sorry I forgot to include the attachments Doug Original Message From Gunthert Douglas Sent Friday October PM To Hayslett Rod Saunders James Cordes Bill Place Janet Peters Jerry Wiederholt Patricia Anderson Marcia Cc Sutton Lisa Thompson Shari Gunthert Douglas Subject Final Report for Audit of Conflicts of InterestsBusiness Conduct Attached is our final report for the audit of conflicts of interestbusiness conduct for NBPL Also attached is a memorandum covering additional work performed in this area for Northern Border Partners LP No material control weaknesses were noted Selected minor issues noted include updates to policies and procedures and the distribution of the conflicts of interest questionnaire Management has agreed to update policies and procedures and have established procedures on the distribution of conflict of interest questionnaires
